column5: Piicture blog of a recent fish die off in California ...the sheer # is insane. I'd be scoopin' and freezing for bait... My link
scary about all of those massive fish/bird die offs of late. Really worrying.  Mass Animal Deaths  This was last updated Jan.5/11...
I saw that on cbc.ca today and thought 'Man, those would be great for spring pike', lol
They all swam into the harbour and deleted the oxygen. The guy with the dumpster with plastic lining has an idea i think !! LOL
Took the words right out of my mouth dude

This happened last year on Erie with the smelt it was a entire lake event MNR guy said (He was doing creel studies on LPB) they figured it was well into the millions that died off and said it was a normal die off it Killed the spring pike fishing worst spring I and many other anglers have had .
LOL!! I was thinking the same thing too!! hahaha
It happens on this side of Lake Erie with the shad too. Nothing like dragging a jig across the bottom and hooking a rotting shad. At least the turtles and crawfish eat well.
